meta.title: Mutiny - Hidden Barrels
meta.description: To play, first start a game on the computer. You will be given a ship name. Boarding. 3 to 8 players.

homepage.homePhraseDesktop: One phone per player is required to control their shipmate
homepage.homePhraseMobile: Join a game from a computer gascreenme

mobileContent.instruction: To play, first start a game on the computer. You will be given a ship name.

portrait.title: Welcome !
portrait.instruction: To be ready, turn your phone around.

landscape.instruction: To start the revolt, select a game mode.

setup.playersPlaceholder:
No sailors on deck...
“sounds of crickets“
setup.infos: To join the crew, go to Mutiny.com with your phone.

modalJoin.title: Join the vessel
modalJoin.description: Enter the code below on Mutiny.com with your phone or flash the QR code directly.

1.name: Stalkers Stalked
1.shortDescription:
Sneak into the crew, oust your rivals and overthrow the captain.
Let the silent mutiny begin!
1.description: Do you want to be the captain of the ship? Earn the most terror points by attacking your opponents. The clues to your next target are on your dashboard. Have a nice trip!
